Every thought, every aspiration, every action is a note in the Symphony of the Future.


As we celebrate our Group‚Äôs 70th anniversary, we invite you to be part of #MyFutureNote - a campaign that unites team members, partners, customers, and our global community to shape the future, one note at a time.


The idea is simple: What‚Äôs your note for the future? Whether under Innovation, Collaboration, Sustainability, or Culture, each contribution helps us orchestrate our Symphony of the Future.


Post your future note, ex.: ‚ÄúMy Future Note is innovation. I‚Äôm reimagining luxury experiences through digital transformation.‚Äù using the hashtags #MyFutureNote #SymphonyOfTheFuture

Celebrating Ramdan in Egypt

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=555&user=10620>

From engaging conversations to a fun riddle challenge, the night was filled with teamwork, joy, and a sense of belonging.

<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=555&user=10620> 	
Our team in Egypt's shoor was more than just a gathering‚Äîit was a moment to strengthen connections, celebrate our values, and honor our Loyalty Award recipients who have been with us for over 10 years. From engaging conversations to a fun riddle challenge, the night was filled with teamwork, joy, and a sense of belonging. 
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-5-min.png> 	

Give With Love This Eid at Tryano


Discover elegant ensembles from regional designers and exclusive capsule collections. Indulge in statement bag and shoe collections and elevate your celebrations with exquisite jewelry, powerful fragrances, and one-of-a-kind men‚Äôs accessories. Enjoy effortless and memorable personalized concierge services, beauty treatments, a VIP lounge, and home delivery.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/6c02f715f8a1235ce8032ea50df7920e411276808.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

WE want YOUR REFERRALS!  

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/915ec1f09e3682cf2045e933aac0ed68392026993.gif> 	

NEWGEN Season 3 is here and we need your help to identify top talent who can thrive in this incredible opportunity!

This 6-month development program is designed to fast-track aspiring team members into key roles within our Group, offering them a chance to work on innovative projects and learn from industry leaders.

Creating Impact with SGII & Level Shoes

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=561&user=10620> 	
In the spirit of Zayed Humanitarian Day, the SGII team collaborated with Level Shoes and MSS NGO to share a meaningful Iftar with 4,000 labourers at Jebel Ali Labour Camp. This special initiative was brought to life through cutting, packing, serving, and spreading joy.
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=562&user=10620>
